name: I'm Muhojukk
description:
Description:

Oh no!

Is there really no one to save these crumbs of fireflies?

Who will take on the role of a brave warrior and lead the kids through the crowds of bloodthirsty spiders?

Have time to plunge into this fascinating micro world!

Peculiarities:

- Top notch storyline

-AAA textures and models

- Breathtaking music

Come in and enjoy!

Control:

WASD - Management

LMB - Light Calling Fireflies

RMB - Predator Slowing Light

Esc - Hint
